div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 890 Ablanica, c. 70 km. S of Pazardzik, Bulgaria, 1940 Burial: 170-160 B.C. (T) Contents: 36+ AE. Pot hoard Macedonia, time of Philip V-Perseus: (all as AMNG III.1, pl. 1, 22) Disposition: Plovdiv 36 Gerasimov, BIAB 14 (1940-2), p. 282
